Sentencas: The solid oxide cell (SOC) based on a proton-conducting electrolyte is promising to play an important role in large-scale energy storage and hydrogen production.
Titulo: High Performance and Stability Enabled by Tuning the Component Thermal Expansion Coefficients of a Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Operating at High Steam Concentration

Sentencas: However, its development is hindered by performance degradation caused by the mismatch in thermal expansion coefficients (TECs) between the electrolyte and the oxygen electrode.
Titulo: High Performance and Stability Enabled by Tuning the Component Thermal Expansion Coefficients of a Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Operating at High Steam Concentration

Sentencas: Although there is work on reducing TECs of the oxygen electrode, it is difficult to find proper materials having a low TEC while maintaining a high performance.
Titulo: High Performance and Stability Enabled by Tuning the Component Thermal Expansion Coefficients of a Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Operating at High Steam Concentration

Sentencas: In this paper, we propose a new path to solve this problem: increasing the TEC of the electrolyte.
Titulo: High Performance and Stability Enabled by Tuning the Component Thermal Expansion Coefficients of a Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Operating at High Steam Concentration

Sentencas: We demonstrate that doping Fe into BaZr0.3Ce0.5Y0.1Yb0.1O3-delta (BZCYYb) can increase the TEC from 10.3 x 10-6 K-1 of BZCYYb to 13.4 x 10-6 K-1 of BaZr0.3Ce0.48Fe0.02Y0.1Yb0.1O3-delta (BZCYYbF).
Titulo: High Performance and Stability Enabled by Tuning the Component Thermal Expansion Coefficients of a Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Operating at High Steam Concentration

Sentencas: Fe doping also enhances the sinterability, electrochemical performance, and stability of the electrolyte.
Titulo: High Performance and Stability Enabled by Tuning the Component Thermal Expansion Coefficients of a Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Operating at High Steam Concentration

Sentencas: Meanwhile, we find that doping Fe into the oxygen electrode material PrNi0.5Co0.5O3-delta (PNC) decreases the TEC from 19.2 x 10-6 K-1 of PNC to 17.4 x 10-6 K-1 of PrNi0.4Co0.4Fe0.2O3-delta (PNCF).
Titulo: High Performance and Stability Enabled by Tuning the Component Thermal Expansion Coefficients of a Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Operating at High Steam Concentration

Sentencas: The improved stability of the SOC with the BZCYYbF electrolyte and the PNCF oxygen electrode is verified for steam electrolysis under a high steam partial pressure, 50%.
Titulo: High Performance and Stability Enabled by Tuning the Component Thermal Expansion Coefficients of a Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Operating at High Steam Concentration

Sentencas: Such a cell operates stably at a current density of 1.76 A cm-2 under 1.30 V and 700 degrees C for 150 h.
Titulo: High Performance and Stability Enabled by Tuning the Component Thermal Expansion Coefficients of a Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Cell Operating at High Steam Concentration
